input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item name.

Item name:
Spalding NBA 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Acrylic Backboard

Item features:
44 Inch steel framed acrylic backboard
The Slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 Inch heavy-duty solid steel rim. Includes a white, all-weather net.
The Ratchet lift provides rim height adjustment from 8 feet to 10 feet in 4-inch increments
Three pieces 3 Inch round pole
35-gallon capacity base filled with water or sand for stability
The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
The Spalding 73952 Portable Basketball Hoop with 44 Inch Framed Acrylic Backboard features a sturdy three-piece 3-inch pole. The slam jam breakaway rim is a 5/8 inch heavy-duty solid steel rim that protects the basketball hoop backboard by bending with every hard dunk and slam and includes a heavy-duty white net. The basketball hoop adjusts from 8 feet to 10 feet via an easy-to-use ratchet lift adjustment system. This basketball hoop is ideal for anyone who wants the convenience of portability and the stability that a 35-gallon base--filled with water or sand for stability--can provide.
The portable Basketball Rim adjusts from 7.5 feet to 10 feet.
input_text.Response B: The Hot Wheels Fun In The Tub Playset will make your kid eager for bath time, with a steep track that easily attaches to the tub with suction cups.  The child will be thrilled to watch the included car hurtle down the track through the included attached flames when they tip the water filled cup which propels the car.
